name: Nova Zone - Pico-8 Edition
description:
Nova Zone - Pico-8 Edition is a fan demake/remake of Nova Zone, a fictional video game that appears in a short Twine story by publisher Eggware.xyz called Attract Mode.

Made and coded over a couple of weeks, this recreation of one of the finest haunted video games of Uncle Ted's Arcade has seen. It's also a token of appreciation by the coder to the original creators.

Attract Mode, Nova Zone (C) Eggware.xyz
Game and code (C) Mowl/T.A.E.
